name: Huntsman
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a living player: the Damsel, if chosen, becomes a not-in-play Townsfolk. [+the Damsel]

legacy.otherNightReminder: If the Huntsman has not used their ability: The Huntsman either shows a 'no' head shake or points to a player. If that player is the Damsel: Replace the Damsel with a not-in-play Townsfolk token.

otherNights.description: Once per game, choose a living player: the Damsel, if chosen, becomes a not-in-play Townsfolk.

information.customMessage: Choose a player; if Damsel, replace with not-in-play Townsfolk.
